abstract: A public appeal from the Department of Immigration to promote its 'Bring Out a Briton' campaign. Form your committee now!
description: "Form a committee in your district and... Bring Out A Briton". Chips Rafferty is called upon to promote the Department of Immigration's campaign to encourage sponsored British migration to Australia. Launched in 1957, the program urged towns across Australia to form committees to organise employment opportunities and accommodation for incoming British migrants.
